@dev Oracle fullfill method. Executes withdrawal.
 @param withdrawalId The id of the Withdrawal

constructor.details: Initiates MergeToken and set owner as oracle.

deposit(uint8,string,uint64).details: Deposit ETH on any pull request or issue on GitHub.

params.id: The node ID of the issue or pr
params.lockDays: The number of day the deposit will be locked

params.oracle: The oracle address to remove (cannot be owner)

forceRefund(uint256).details: Send deposit back to sender regardless of lock.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

refundAll(uint256[]).details: Send all specified deposits back to sender.

register(string).details: Verify ownership over GitHub account by checking for a repositry ofgithubUser named after msg.sender. Adds user as unconfirmed and sendsan oracle request, that will be fullfilled in registerConfirm.

registerConfirm(string,address).details: Oracle fullfill method. Sets unconfirmed user to confirmed if repo exists.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.     * NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

withdraw(uint256).details: Send deposit to contributor if deposit's conditions are met.
